extendedInfo.description: Please NOTE (for Kindle): To install this app please click here - http://www.dyyno.com/assets/android_apps/app_appuseriestv_v1.0.1.apkAppu Series TV is a one stop channel for kids and their parents who want to enjoy a wide range of animated and live action videos. The Appu Series has a wealth of content for kids that not only helps them learn about the world around them, but also helps in better retention of these lessons by mixing learning with multimedia entertainment.Check out our collection of nursery rhymes, stories, arts and crafts and much more.

reviews.title: Does not open
reviews.comment: Great idea but does not load. Says run time error.
reviews.author: Sumit Kumar
